gen:link.msg:message: `FinancialAssets` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesFinancialAssetsBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_FinancialAssets')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesFinancialAssetsBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_FinancialAssets return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesFinancialAssetsBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfFinancialAssetsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesFinancialAssetsBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfFinancialAssetsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesFinancialAssetsBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfFinancialAssetsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesFinancialAssetsBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfFinancialAssetsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
